fields.title: Convert to PDF Option
fields.description: There needs to be a button to convert the file to a PDF when creating invoices.

fields.title: Search Option Needed
fields.description: A search option for generated reports is needed to allow users to find archived data more easily.

fields.title: Missing Button ?
fields.description: There needs to be a buttons for submitting claims. Not sure how the client will be able to do their work otherwise.

fields.title: Print from Web Needed
fields.description: Client is requesting an option to print monthly billing reports without having to export data first. They can currently do this by exporting to PDF and then printing but they would like to be able to do this directly from the web interface and have the report format correctly.

fields.title: New reporting options
fields.description: Client is requesting the ability to create new reports that show 1 yr, 5 yr and 10 year trends in claim payouts. This should be a dropdown option in the web app.

fields.title: Make it pretty
fields.description: Client wants the web app to look pretty instead of the rows and rows of text boxes. Needs a modern style update and new responsive design.

fields.title: Undo option
fields.description: The client has requested an undo option for when they accidentally remove a record in the claims web app. Several users have already accidentally deleted important claim information and needed to be able to go back and recover it.
